text: allāhu avareyellāṁ orumiccu cērkkundinaṁ avan paṟayuṁ: "jinnsamūhamē; manuṣyaril vaḷare pēre niṅṅaḷ vaḻipiḻappicciṭṭuṇṭ.” appēāḷ avaruṭe ātmamitraṅṅaḷāyirunna manuṣyar paṟayuṁ: "ñaṅṅaḷuṭe nāthā! ñaṅṅaḷ parasparaṁ sukhāsvādanaṅṅaḷkk upayēāgappeṭuttiyiṭṭuṇṭ. ippēāḷ nī ñaṅṅaḷkk anuvadicca avadhiyil ñaṅṅaḷettiyirikkunnu”. allāhu aṟiyikkuṁ: śari, ini narakattīyāṇ niṅṅaḷuṭe tāmasasthalaṁ. niṅṅaḷaviṭe sthiravāsikaḷāyirikkuṁ. allāhu icchicca samayameāḻike. ninṟe nāthan yuktimānuṁ ellāṁ aṟiyunnavanuṁ tanne; tīrcca
